item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3let4nbggvk2h
item.description: So, it appears you also need to #Cloudflare DNS Challenge configuration in your #Caddyfile if you’re using Cloudflare access policy for your service: deuts.org/∞ #Caddy
item.content:encoded: So, it appears you also need to #Cloudflare DNS Challenge configuration in your #Caddyfile if you’re using Cloudflare access policy for your service: deuts.org/∞ #Caddy

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lesw62kwvk25
item.description: Any Docker app that insists on #Docker volumes and not support volume binds will be a no go moving forward. I’m looking at you #SearXNG, #Grafana, and #Prometheus.
item.content:encoded: Any Docker app that insists on #Docker volumes and not support volume binds will be a no go moving forward. I’m looking at you #SearXNG, #Grafana, and #Prometheus.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lesvj73d3k25
item.description: Dealing with Docker volumes is just a pain - restoring always comes with annoying permission issues. I much prefer using volume binds for persistence – full control over the file system, no guesswork on data location, and backups are a breeze. Anyone else feel the same? #Docker #DevOps #Containers
item.content:encoded: Dealing with Docker volumes is just a pain - restoring always comes with annoying permission issues. I much prefer using volume binds for persistence – full control over the file system, no guesswork on data location, and backups are a breeze. Anyone else feel the same? #Docker #DevOps #Containers

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lesjdhn6as25
item.description:
My wishlist for #OpenGist:

  1. Ability to add custom metadata
  2. Home should point to All (existing) gists, not new gist
  3. Better search, include description, url and any custom metadata in the search parameters and results. github.com/∞
item.content:encoded:
My wishlist for #OpenGist:

  1. Ability to add custom metadata
  2. Home should point to All (existing) gists, not new gist
  3. Better search, include description, url and any custom metadata in the search parameters and results. github.com/∞

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lepzmm5jgc23
item.description: Is it just me? I find so much insight from running docker stats regularly via cron, logging them, and data modeling and analyzing via #PowerQuery and #PowerPivot #DAX compared to what I have with the #Prometheus, #Grafana, CAdvisor, and Node-Exporter. The latter further consumes system resources.
item.content:encoded: Is it just me? I find so much insight from running docker stats regularly via cron, logging them, and data modeling and analyzing via #PowerQuery and #PowerPivot #DAX compared to what I have with the #Prometheus, #Grafana, CAdvisor, and Node-Exporter. The latter further consumes system resources.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3leeblsfh522r
item.description: Received an email from GreenCloud #VPS yesterday, saying they’re migrating control panel from SolusVM to VirtFusion, but they’re letting customers take care of the backup and restore process. Why can’t there just be a more seamless process for customers instead? deuts.org/∞
item.content:encoded: Received an email from GreenCloud #VPS yesterday, saying they’re migrating control panel from SolusVM to VirtFusion, but they’re letting customers take care of the backup and restore process. Why can’t there just be a more seamless process for customers instead? deuts.org/∞

item.description: MetroDeal already ceased operations earlier this year? Learned about it just now. I can only reminisce about the deals we availed of in the past. www.gmanetwork.com/∞
item.content:encoded: MetroDeal already ceased operations earlier this year? Learned about it just now. I can only reminisce about the deals we availed of in the past. www.gmanetwork.com/∞
